item.title: How to Travel Vlog (2015)
item.description:
How to Travel Vlog (2015)

How to Travel Vlog // Travel Vlogging 101 From the best vlogging camera to how to make a travel video, I'll show you how to travel vlog. Travel videos are a lot of fun to shoot, but the best travel videos require a plan.

item.title: Travel Photography Tips -- National Geographic
item.description:
Travel Photography Tips -- National Geographic

By Robert Caputo, August 2007 From Photography Field Guide: Travel Each place we visit has its own particular look, character, and ambiance. If we want photographs of our travels to be good and lasting, they should capture all of these qualities, and say as much about a place as give the literal look of it.

item.title: Best website to checkout for latest cruises
item.description:
Best website to checkout for latest cruises

Cruise plotter is an interactive map based website which is able to tell you all the latest available international cruises in a single glance. The website features a neat search engine which you could search the available departures based on your budget.

item.title: Top tips for travellers going to India
item.description:
Top tips for travellers going to India

Please do carry some essential over the counter medication for simple illness such as headache, cough and cold.

item.title: 21 Places Every Photographer Should Visit Before They Die
item.description:
21 Places Every Photographer Should Visit Before They Die

Elia Locardi is an internationally-recognized professional travel photographer, Fujifilm Global Ambassador and X-Photographer, writer, public speaker, and educator who spends his life shooting some of the most beautiful locations in the world. Location independent since March of 2012, he and his wife Naomi live a 100% mobile lifestyle, perpetually traveling from country to country, continuously circling the globe.

item.title: 7 Steps to Becoming a More Sustainable Traveler
item.description:
7 Steps to Becoming a More Sustainable Traveler

In the course of my travels-and my career as a promoter and practitioner of sustainable tourism-one question comes up again and again: "What can I do to be a more responsible traveler?" So I thought I'd pen a primer. 1. Avoid the plane and take the train .

item.title: 5 Tips for Making Great Travel Videos
item.description:
5 Tips for Making Great Travel Videos

Going on a sweet trip soon? Want to make videos of your trip that are actually worth watching later? Use these 5 tips for making great travel videos before you go! (Also, want to learn how to get free flights?

item.title: PurePods - An unforgettable New Zealand experience
item.description:
PurePods - An unforgettable New Zealand experience

PurePods is a total immersion, totally private experience of your own slice of beauty. The PurePod is designed from the foundations up for environmental sustainability

item.title: Cruising 101 | Fodor's Travel
item.description:
Cruising 101 | Fodor's Travel

You've decided you'd like to set out on a cruise vacation. With something for just about everyone, cruises cater to all kinds of travelers-rest assured, the perfect fit is just waiting for you, once you know just where (and how) to look.
